work.name: Sportradar
work.summary:
Specialize in data analysis for player and team performance across major U.S. sports: NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB, college basketball, and college football. 
Contribute to high-profile sports broadcasts, including the NFL Playoffs, Super Bowl, and March Madness, by providing information for unique and insightful graphics and commentary.
Utilize advanced SQL queries to access and analyze historical sports data, support client inquiries, enhance television broadcasts, and use data to tell a compelling story.

work.name: Sedgwick
work.summary:
Completed end-to-end data science projects, combining skills in Dataiku, SQL, and R. 
Responsibilities included data preparation and cleaning, model development and production. With a focus on enhancing predictive accuracy and operational efficiency.
Created and implemented a fraudulent claim detection model using unsupervised learning techniques as well as a model for predicting large loss claims.
